body:
$TSLA $AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $SPY 
Quanta, the world's biggest contract notebook manufacturer and a MacBook maker.
Tesla has shuttered its Shanghai Giga factory, which produced about 2,000 electric cars a day.

Incoming cargo is now stuck at Shanghai marine terminals for an average of eight days before it's transported elsewhere, a 75% increase since the recent round of lockdowns began.
Cargo airlines have canceled all flights in and out of the city, and more than 90% of trucks supporting import and export deliveries are currently out of action.

"I think we're in for more volatility and economic and social disruption for at least the next six months."
https://www.kten.com/story/46302571/the-biggest-risk-to-the-global-economy-no-one-is-talking-about

links.title: The biggest risk to the global economy no one is talking about
links.description: Sony and Apple supplier plants in and around Shanghai are idle. Quanta, the world's biggest contract notebook manufacturer and a MacBook maker, has stopped production entirely. The plant accounts for about 20% of Quanta's notebook production capacity, and the company previously estimated it would ship 72 million units this year.

body:
$SPY $AAPL $TSLA $AMD $NVDA 
Crash coming on upcoming  tech sector earnings. 

87 of China’s 100 largest cities had imposed some form of restriction on movement.
For the world, China’s Covid shutdowns could feed inflation by further disrupting the supply chains that many manufacturers rely on, pushing up the cost of making and transporting goods.
Executives in the auto industry and tech sector, two of China’s biggest employers, have begun warning in recent days of crippling disruption to their nationwide operations if Shanghai, in particular, cannot reopen soon. 

https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.nytimes.com/2022/04/17/business/china-economy-gdp.amp.html

links.title: China's Economic Data Hints at Cost of Zero Covid Strategy
links.description: The country's lockdowns have trapped truck drivers on highways, halted production lines and forced some importers to source goods from outside China. BEIJING - Faced with its worst Covid-19 outbreak yet, China has been enforcing an expanding number of mass quarantines, strict lockdowns and border controls.

body:
$AAPL $TSLA $NVDA $AMD $SPY 
Apple Inc supplier Pegatron Corp (4938.TW) said this week it would suspend its plants in Shanghai and Kunshan.
Quanta Computer Inc (2382.TW), which produces some three-quarters of Apple's Macbooks globally, also shut operations, which could impact delivers more severely, analysts said.
The final impact on Apple's supply chain is uncertain and depends on factors including how long lockdowns persist.

https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/apple-others-face-shipment-delays-china-covid-curbs-squeeze-suppliers-analysts-2022-04-15/

links.title: Apple, others face shipment delays as China COVID curbs squeeze suppliers
links.description: SHANGHAI/TAIPEI, April 15 (Reuters) - Shipments of some Apple products, as well as Dell and Lenovo laptops are likely to face delays if China's COVID-19 lockdowns persist, analysts said, as curbs force assemblers to shut down and closed-loop arrangements get harder to maintain.

links.title: Ongoing lockdowns in China threaten disruptions in global electronics supply chain
links.description: Lockdowns underway in China to control the spread of COVID-19 are raising the specter of significant disruptions in the global supply chain for electronic components and consumer electronics, according to Omdia. Major cities in China are implementing restrictive measures to halt the spread of COVID-19 under the country's "zero COVID-19" policy.

links.title: It's complicated: The Fed's actions and the stock market have an unpredictable relationship
links.description: The U.S. stock market won't necessarily perform poorly because of the Federal Reserve's quantitative-tightening policy. (QT). This is hardly the consensus view, which confidently holds that QT is bad for the stock market. But the job of a contrarian is to test the assumptions that everyone else takes for granted.
